commandOpenWebsiteStoreDescription_Premi.original: The Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium store page

extensionDescription.message: Pilih teks pada halaman web manapun, dan mintalah komputer Talkie dengan keras untuk Anda dengan mengklik tombol Talkie .
extensionDescription.original: Select text on any web page, and have the computer read it out loud for you by simply clicking the Talkie button.

frontend_aboutThankYou.message: Terima kasih telah Talkie â€” jika Anda suka, beritahu teman Anda!
frontend_aboutThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie â€” if you like it, tell your friends!

frontend_donate_alreadyHavePremium.message: Anda sudah memiliki Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium. Dukungan Anda sudah cukup â€” terima kasih!
frontend_donate_alreadyHavePremium.original: You already have Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium. Your continued support is already enough â€” thank you!

frontend_featuresFree_List03.message: Membaca teks yang dipilih dengan mengklik tombol, tombol pintas, atau menu klik kanan.
frontend_featuresFree_List03.original: Reads selected text by a button click, shortcut key, or right-click menu.

frontend_featuresFree_List04.message: Membaca teks panjang dan artikel dengan suara keras, bahkan saat tab berada di latar belakang.
frontend_featuresFree_List04.original: Reads long texts and articles out loud, even while the tab is in the background.

frontend_featuresFree_List05.message: Kode adalah open source dan tersedia secara gratis untuk semua pengguna.
frontend_featuresFree_List05.original: Code is open source and available for free to all users.

frontend_featuresHeading.original: Features: what Talkie is good at

frontend_featuresPremium_List01.message: Pilih suara default Anda untuk setiap bahasa. Bagus jika Anda bosan dengan suara sistem!
frontend_featuresPremium_List01.original: Choose your own default voice for each language. Great if you get tired of the system voice!

frontend_featuresPremium_List02.message: Pilih kecepatan membaca dan nada per suara. Sesuaikan suara sesuai dengan keinginan anda!
frontend_featuresPremium_List02.original: Choose reading speed and pitch per voice. Adjust voices to your liking!

frontend_featuresPremium_List03.message: Perasaan hangat dan kabur yang Anda dapatkan saat mendukung perangkat lunak open source oleh pengembang independen.
frontend_featuresPremium_List03.original: That warm, fuzzy feeling you get when supporting open source software by independent developers.

frontend_featuresPremium_List04.original: Future Premium updates included for free.

frontend_featuresPremium_List05.message: Baca teks dari clipboard! Cukup salin teks dari manapun ke program mana pun, dan gunakan Talkie Premium untuk Talkie Premium !
frontend_featuresPremium_List05.original: Read text from the clipboard! Just copy text from anywhere in any program, and use Talkie Premium to read it!

frontend_featuresVersion_Free.message: Anda saat ini menggunakan versi gratis Talkie , dan Talkie fitur terbatas tersedia untuk Anda. Mungkin Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium akan menjadi pilihan yang lebih baik untuk Anda?
frontend_featuresVersion_Free.original: You are currently using the free version of Talkie, and a limited set of features is available to you. Perhaps Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium would be a better choice for you?

frontend_featuresVersion_Premium.message: Anda saat ini menggunakan Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium , dan semua fitur tersedia untuk Anda. Terima kasih banyak, ini menghangatkan hatiku!
frontend_featuresVersion_Premium.original: You are currently using the Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium, and all features are available to you. Thank you very much, it warms my heart!

frontend_featuresVersions.message: Talkie hadir dalam dua versi: Talkie dan Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium. Versi gratis sangat bagus untuk sebagian besar kasus penggunaan, namun versi premium menawarkan opsi tambahan.
frontend_featuresVersions.original: Talkie comes in two versions: Talkie and Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium. The free version is great for most use cases, but the premium version offers additional options.

frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopup.original: Hide donation buttons in the popup

frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.message: Bukannya saya tidak ingin Anda Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium atau Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium untuk Talkie dan pengembangan sumber terbuka secara umum â€” saya tidak ingin Anda Talkie saat Talkie di tempat pertama. Jika Anda Talkie tombol donasi di popup, saya harap Anda juga akan Talkie dalam beberapa cara! Tombolnya akan selalu tersedia di sini di antara pilihan, untuk jaga-jaga.
frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.original: It's not like I don't want you to get Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium or donate to support Talkie and open source development in general â€” I just don't want you to be annoyed when using Talkie in the first place. If you disable the donation buttons in the popup, I hope that you will also support Talkie in some way! The buttons will always be available here among the options, just in case.

frontend_licenseCLADescription.message: Semua kontribusi ke Talkie dibuat berdasarkan Perjanjian Lisensi Kontributor (CLA).
frontend_licenseCLADescription.original: All contributions to Talkie are made under the Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie dikembangkan beberapa hari sebelum Tahun Baru 2016/2017, atas tantangan dari seorang teman. Tantangan dimulai dengan pertanyaan: saat pulang kerja, mungkinkah untuk mendengarkan sebuah artikel daripada membacanya? Mudah, kataku, dan bersiap untuk membuktikannya â€” atau setidaknya membuat perambanku mengeluarkan teks dengan suara komputer yang konyol. Versi dasarnya, tanpa antarmuka pengguna, ternyata sepele untuk dibuat. Menambahkan antarmuka pengguna, butuh waktu sedikit lebih lama. Menambahkan deteksi bahasa yang tepat lebih banyak kode. Mengatasi bug di browser malah lebih banyak bekerja. Daftar perbaikan dan fitur terus berlanjut â€” dan beberapa ribu baris kode kemudian, Anda melihat hasil akhirnya.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it â€” or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic version, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on â€” and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

frontend_storyThankYou.message: Terima kasih telah Talkie â€” jika Anda suka, beritahu teman Anda!
frontend_storyThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie â€” if you like it, tell your friends!

frontend_talkieInFirefoxAddons_Premium.message: Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium di Firefox Add-on
frontend_talkieInFirefoxAddons_Premium.original: Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium in the Firefox Add-ons

frontend_talkieInTheChromeWebStore_Free.original: Talkie in the Chrome Web Store

frontend_talkieInTheChromeWebStore_Premi.message: Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium di Toko Web Chrome
frontend_talkieInTheChromeWebStore_Premi.original: Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium in the Chrome Web Store

frontend_usageReadclipboard.message: Di Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium , Anda dapat membaca teks yang disalin ke clipboard Anda â€” gunakan dengan tombol pintas untuk mendengarkan teks dari manapun di luar browser. Anda juga bisa klik kanan pada tombol Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium , atau di area situs web yang kosong, dan pilih baca dari clipboard.
frontend_usageReadclipboard.original: In Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium, you can read any text copied to your clipboard â€” use it with a shortcut key to listen to text from anywhere outside of the browser. You can also right-click on the Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium button, or in an empty area of a website, and select read from clipboard.

frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.message: Anda juga bisa memilih teks, lalu klik kanan padanya, dan pilih Talkie di menu. Cara ini juga bekerja dalam file PDF dan beberapa jenis halaman khusus di browser.
frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.original: You can also select the text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. This way also works in PDF-files and some special types of pages in the browser.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.message: Jika tombol pintas tidak bekerja, periksa apakah itu belum digunakan oleh ekstensi atau program lain.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.original: If the shortcut key does not work, please check that it is not already in use by another extension or program.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.message: Cara Talkie atau mengubah tombol pintas Talkie .
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.original: How to check or change the Talkie shortcut keys.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.message: Pilihan yang mudah Talkie adalah Talkie tombol pintas Talkie :
frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.original: A convenient option is to use the Talkie shortcut keys:

frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescriptionRead.original: Read text from clipboard in any program â€” Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium feature

frontend_voicesDescription.message: Di sini Anda dapat melihat dan menguji suara yang terpasang untuk setiap bahasa di browser Anda. Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium pengguna juga dapat memilih suara favorit mereka sebagai default per bahasa, serta mengubah Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium dan nada untuk setiap suara.
frontend_voicesDescription.original: Here you can see and test installed voices for each language in your browser. Talkie ðŸŒŸ Premium users can also select their favorite voice as the default per language, as well as change speed and pitch for each voice.

noTextSelectedMessage.message: Silahkan pilih teks yang diinginkan di website terlebih dahulu. Anda juga bisa memilih teks, lalu klik kanan padanya, dan pilih Talkie di menu.
noTextSelectedMessage.original: Please select desired text on the website first. You can also select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu.

notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.description: Some tabs can't be accessed by WebExtensions, such as chrome:// and the Chrome Web Store/Firefox Add-ons. This message warns users.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.message: Talkie tidak dapat Talkie teks yang dipilih dari jenis halaman ini. Ini adalah halaman yang sangat spesial, dan ada batasan keamanan yang dimasukkan ke dalam browser. Anda juga bisa mencoba memilih teks, lalu klik kanan padanya, dan pilih Talkie di menu. Saya minta maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.original: Talkie cannot access the selected text from this type of page. It is a very special page, and there are security limitations put in by the browser. You can also try to select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.
